recipe.title: Sausage Stuffing
ingredients: 4 cups coarsely ground crustless French bread
1 7- to 8-ounce jar vacuum-packed steamed chestnuts, chopped
instructions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add sausage and onion. Cook until sausage is cooked through, about 12 minutes. Remove from heat. Mix in remaining ingredients. Season with salt and pepper.
